scripts.build:css: mkdir -p dist && tailwindcss -c tailwind.config.js -i src/input.css -o dist/styles.css --minify && cat node_modules/highlight.js/styles/atom-one-dark.css >> dist/styles.css
scripts.copy:fonts: mkdir -p dist/fonts && cp node_modules/@fontsource/inter/files/inter-latin-400-normal.woff2 node_modules/@fontsource/inter/files/inter-latin-500-normal.woff2 node_modules/@fontsource/inter/files/inter-latin-600-normal.woff2 node_modules/@fontsource/inter/files/inter-latin-700-normal.woff2 dist/fonts/ && cp node_modules/@fontsource/space-grotesk/files/space-grotesk-latin-400-normal.woff2 node_modules/@fontsource/space-grotesk/files/space-grotesk-latin-500-normal.woff2 node_modules/@fontsource/space-grotesk/files/space-grotesk-latin-600-normal.woff2 node_modules/@fontsource/space-grotesk/files/space-grotesk-latin-700-normal.woff2 dist/fonts/
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy:fonts
scripts.deploy:prepare: rm -rf .deploy && mkdir -p .deploy && cp index.html robots.txt sitemap.xml .deploy/ && cp -r dist .deploy/dist
